results.name: Column index of A257503: If A257685(n) = 0, then a(n) = A257682(n), otherwise a(n) = a(A257685(n)).
comment: a(0) = 0 by convention, because 0 is not present in arrays A257503 and A257505.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10080
formula: If A257685(n) = 0, then a(n) = A257682(n), otherwise a(n) = a(A257685(n)).
xref: Column index of A257503, row index of A257505.
Cf. also A257679 (gives the other index).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 04 2015
